deeply.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to emphasize that a belief, feeling, opinion etc is very strong, important, or sincere
deeply.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her lies hurt my father deeply.
Teachers are deeply divided on this issue.
deeply.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Most doctors think deeply about what their patients want.
deeply.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: John kept sinking more deeply into the mud.
